name: CUSTOM Split Slider Video
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>
{%- liquid
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width

  
-%}
{% style %}
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    max-width: {{ content_width }}rem;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

    @media(min-width: 768px) {

      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
        margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      }
      
      .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
        padding: 0 5rem;
        padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
        padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
        padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
        padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      }
      
    }
  
  .split-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    touch-action: pan-y;
  }

  .swiper-wrapper {
    align-items: center;
  }

{% endstyle %}

{% for block in section.blocks %}
  <style>

    {{ block.settings.heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
    {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
    {{ block.settings.text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
    {{ block.settings.link_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
    .split-slider-{{ section.id }} .split-slide-{{ block.id }} {
      display: flex;
      align-items: stratch;
      justify-content: space-between;
      gap: {{ block.settings.columns_gap_mobile }}px;
      background-color: {{ block.settings.slide_bg_color }};
      flex-direction: {{ block.settings.slide_media_position_mobile }};
    }
  
    .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} {
      padding: {{ block.settings.text_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ block.settings.text_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
      background-color: {{ block.settings.slide_text_bg_color }};
      border: {{ block.settings.text_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.slide_text_border_color }};
      border-radius: {{ block.settings.text_radius }}px;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      justify-content: center;
    }
    
    .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} h2 {
      margin: 0;
      font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
      color: {{ block.settings.slide_heading_color }};
      line-height: {{ block.settings.heading_height }}%;
      letter-spacing: {{ block.settings.heading_letter }}px;
      text-transform: unset;
      text-align: {{ block.settings.heading_align }};
    }
    
    .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} h3 {
      margin: 0;
      margin-top: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
      font-size: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
      color: {{ block.settings.slide_sub_heading_color }};
      line-height: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_height }}%;
      letter-spacing: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_letter }}px;
      text-transform: unset;
      text-align: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_align }};
    }

    .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} p {
      margin: 0;
      margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
      font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
      color: {{ block.settings.slide_text_color }};
      line-height: {{ block.settings.text_height }}%;
      letter-spacing: {{ block.settings.text_letter }}px;
      text-transform: unset;
      text-align: {{ block.settings.text_align }};
    }

    .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} a {
      position: relative;
      display: block;
      width: fit-content;
      margin: 0;
      margin-top: {{ block.settings.link_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
      font-size: {{ block.settings.link_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
      color: {{ block.settings.slide_link_color }};
      line-height: {{ block.settings.link_height }}%;
      letter-spacing: {{ block.settings.link_letter }}px;
      text-transform: unset;
      text-decoration: none;
      transition: all 0.1s ease 0s;
    }

    .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} a:hover {
      transition: all 0.1s ease 0s;
      color: {{ block.settings.slide_link_hover_color }};
    }

    .split-slide-media-{{ block.id }} {
      display: flex;
      align-items: stretch;
      gap: {{ block.settings.media_gap }}px;
    }
    
    .split-slide-image-{{ block.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
    
    .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }},
    .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} img,
    .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} svg,
    .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} iframe,
    .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} .split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }} {
      border-radius: {{ block.settings.slide_media_radius }}px;
    }

    .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} > svg,
    .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} > svg {
      background-color: #DCDCDC;
    }
  
    .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }},
    .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} img,
    .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} svg,
    .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} iframe,
    .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} .split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }} {
       border-radius: {{ block.settings.secondary_slide_media_radius }}px; 
    }
    
    .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} img,
    .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} img,
    .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} svg,
    .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} svg,
    .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} video,
    .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} video {
       display: block;
       object-fit: cover;
       width: 100%;
       height: 100%;
     }

    .split-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination {
      left: 50% !important;
      bottom: {{ section.settings.bullets_mb_mobile }}px;
      transform: translate3d(0,0,0) translateX(-50%) !important;
      background-color: {{ section.settings.bullets_bg_color }};
      padding: {{ section.settings.bullets_padding_vertical | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px {{ section.settings.bullets_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
      border-radius: {{ section.settings.slide_bullets_radius }}px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      gap: 12px;
      width: fit-content !important;
    }
    
    .split-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination .swiper-pagination-bullet {
      background-color: {{ section.settings.bullets_color }};
      width: 12px;
      height: 12px;
    }

    .split-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .split-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      transform: translateY(-50%);
      z-index: 2;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      width: 30px;
      height: 30px;
      border-radius: 50%;
      background-color: {{ section.settings.btn_bg_color }};
      cursor: pointer;
      transition: all 0.5s ease 0s;
    }

    .split-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .split-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.5s ease 0s;
      background-color: {{ section.settings.btn_bg_hover_color }};
    } 
    
    .split-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
    .split-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
      width: 15px;
      height: 15px;
      display: block;
      object-fit: contain;
    }
  
    .split-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path,
    .split-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path {
      fill: #FFFFFF;
    }
    
    .split-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
      left: 15px;
    }
  
    .split-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      right: 15px;
    }
  
    .split-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg{
      transform: rotate(90deg);
    }
    
    .split-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg{
      transform: rotate(-90deg);
    }
  
    .split-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
    .split-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
      opacity: 0.2;
    }

    .split-slide-video-{{ block.id }}.split-hide {
      display: none;
    }
  
    .split-slide-video-{{ block.id }} {
      position: relative;
    }

    .split-slide-video-{{ block.id }} iframe {
      display: block;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      object-fit: cover;
      border: 0;
    }
      
    .split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }} {
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      background-color: #DCDCDC;
      z-index: 2;
    }

    .split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }}:empty {
      display: block
    }
  
    .split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }}.split-hide {
      display: none;
    }

    .split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }} img,
    .split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }} svg {
      display: block;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      object-fit: cover;
    }
  
    .split-slide-video-btn-{{ block.id }} {
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      left: 50%;
      transform: translate(-50%,-50%);
      z-index: 4;
    }

    .split-slide-video-btn-{{ block.id }}.split-hide {
      display: none;
    }

    .split-slide-btn-{{ block.id }} {
      border-radius: 50%;
      cursor: pointer;
      position: relative;
      -moz-background-clip: border;
      -webkit-background-clip: border;
      background-clip: border-box;
  
      -moz-background-clip: padding;
      -webkit-background-clip: padding;
      background-clip: padding-box;
  
      -moz-background-clip: content;
      -webkit-background-clip: content;
      background-clip: content-box;
    }

    .split-slide-video-first-{{ block.id }} .split-slide-btn-{{ block.id }} {
      width: {{ block.settings.slide_icon_size | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
      height: {{ block.settings.slide_icon_size | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    }
    
    .split-slide-video-third-{{ block.id }} .split-slide-btn-{{ block.id }} {
      width: {{ block.settings.secondary_slide_icon_size | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
      height: {{ block.settings.secondary_slide_icon_size | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    }

    .split-slide-btn-{{ block.id }} img {
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      display: block;
      object-fit: cover;
    }

    .split-slide-{{ block.id }} > .split-slide-video-element {
      display: none;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 768px) {
      .split-slider-{{ section.id }} .split-slide-{{ block.id }} {
        gap: {{ block.settings.columns_gap }}px;
      }

      .split-slide-video-{{ block.id }} iframe {
          display: block;
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%;
          object-fit: cover;
          border: 0;
          box-shadow: none;
        }
      
      .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} {
        padding: {{ block.settings.text_padding_vertical }}px {{ block.settings.text_padding_horizontal }}px;
      }
  
      .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} h2 {
        font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size }}px;
      }

      .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} h3 {
        margin-top: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_mt }}px;
        font-size: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_size }}px;
      }

      .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} p {
        margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt }}px;
        font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size }}px;
      }

      .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} a {
        margin-top: {{ block.settings.link_mt }}px;
        font-size: {{ block.settings.link_size }}px;
      }
      
      .split-slide-image-{{ block.id }}  {
        display: block;
      }
      
      .split-slide-{{ block.id }} > .split-slide-video-element {
        display: block;
      }

      .split-slide-media-{{ block.id }} {
        display: none;
      }

      .split-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination {
        bottom: {{ section.settings.bullets_mb }}px;
        padding: {{ section.settings.bullets_padding_vertical }}px {{ section.settings.bullets_padding_horizontal }}px;
      }
      
      .split-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .split-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
      }
      
      .split-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
      .split-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
        width: 20px;
        height: 20px;
      }

      .split-slide-video-{{ block.id }}.split-hide {
        display: block;
      }
      
      .split-slide-video-first-{{ block.id }} .split-slide-btn-{{ block.id }} {
        width: {{ block.settings.slide_icon_size }}px;
        height: {{ block.settings.slide_icon_size }}px;
      }

      .split-slide-video-third-{{ block.id }} .split-slide-btn-{{ block.id }} {
        width: {{ block.settings.secondary_slide_icon_size }}px;
        height: {{ block.settings.secondary_slide_icon_size }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>

  {% if block.settings.link_style == "button" %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} a {
        padding: {{ block.settings.link_padding_vertical | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px {{ block.settings.link_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
        background-color: {{ block.settings.slide_link_bg_color }};
        border: {{ block.settings.link_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.slide_link_border_color }};
        border-radius: {{ block.settings.link_radius }}px;
      }
      .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} a:hover {
        background-color: {{ block.settings.slide_link_bg_hover_color }};
        border: {{ block.settings.link_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.slide_link_border_hover_color }};
      }

      @media(min-width: 768px) {
        .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} a {
          padding: {{ block.settings.link_padding_vertical }}px {{ block.settings.link_padding_horizontal }}px;
        }
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}

  {% if block.settings.link_align == "center" %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} a {
        margin-left: auto;
        margin-right: auto;
      }
    </style>
  {% elsif block.settings.link_align == "right" %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} a {
        margin-left: auto;
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}
  
  {% if block.settings.slide_columns == "3" %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }},
      .split-slide-second-{{ block.id }},
      .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} {
        flex: 1 1 33.33%;
      }
      @media(min-width: 768px) {
        .split-slider-{{ section.id }} .split-slide-{{ block.id }} {
          flex-direction: row;
        }
      }
    </style>
  {% else %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} {
        flex: 1 1 {{ block.settings.slide_media_width }}%;
      }
      .split-slide-second-{{ block.id }} {
        flex: 1 1 calc(100% - {{ block.settings.slide_media_width }}%);
      }
      @media(min-width: 768px) {
        .split-slider-{{ section.id }} .split-slide-{{ block.id }} {
          flex-direction: {{ block.settings.slide_layout }};
        }
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}

  {% if block.settings.slide_columns == "3" and block.settings.slide_layout_big == "first" %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} {
        order: 2;
      }
      .split-slide-second-{{ block.id }} {
        order: 1;
      }
      .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} {
        order: 3;
      }
    </style>
  {% elsif block.settings.slide_columns == "3" and block.settings.slide_layout_big == "second" %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} {
        order: 1;
      }
      .split-slide-second-{{ block.id }} {
        order: 2;
      }
      .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} {
        order: 3;
      }
    </style>
  {% elsif block.settings.slide_columns == "3" and block.settings.slide_layout_big == "third" %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} {
        order: 1;
      }
      .split-slide-second-{{ block.id }} {
        order: 3;
      }
      .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} {
        order: 2;
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}

  {% if section.settings.hide_navigation %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-pagination-{{ section.id }},
      .split-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .split-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
      @media(min-width: 768px) {
        .split-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
        .split-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
          display: block;
        }
        .split-slide-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
          display: flex;
        }
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}

  {% if block.settings.media_custom %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }},
      .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} img,
      .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} svg,
      .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} iframe
      .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} video {
        height: {{ block.settings.media_height_mobile }}px;
      }
      
      @media(min-width: 768px) {
        .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }},
        .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} img,
        .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} svg,
        .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} iframe
        .split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} video {
          height: {{ block.settings.media_height }}px;
        }
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}

  {% if block.settings.secondary_media_custom %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }},
      .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} img,
      .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} svg,
      .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} iframe
      .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} video {
        height: {{ block.settings.secondary_media_height_mobile }}px;
      }
      
      @media(min-width: 768px) {
        .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }},
        .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} img,
        .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} svg,
        .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} iframe
        .split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} video {
          height: {{ block.settings.secondary_media_height }}px;
        }
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}

  {% if block.settings.heading_custom %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} h2 {
        font-family: {{ block.settings.heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.heading_font.fallback_families }};
        font-weight: {{ block.settings.heading_font.weight }};
        font-style: {{ block.settings.heading_font.style }};
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}

  {% if block.settings.sub_heading_custom %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} h3 {
        font-family: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font.fallback_families }};
        font-weight: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font.weight }};
        font-style: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font.style }};
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}

  {% if block.settings.text_custom %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} p {
        font-family: {{ block.settings.text_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.text_font.fallback_families }};
        font-weight: {{ block.settings.text_font.weight }};
        font-style: {{ block.settings.text_font.style }};
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}

  {% if block.settings.link_custom %}
    <style>
      .split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} a {
        font-family: {{ block.settings.link_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.link_font.fallback_families }};
        font-weight: {{ block.settings.link_font.weight }};
        font-style: {{ block.settings.link_font.style }};
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}
  
{% endfor %}


<div class="section-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
  <div class="page-width section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
    <div class="split-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
      <div class="swiper-wrapper">
        
        {% for block in section.blocks %}

          {% assign video_id = block.settings.slide_video.id | default: block.settings.slide_video_url.id %}
          {% assign secondary_video_id = block.settings.secondary_slide_video.id | default: block.settings.secondary_slide_video_url.id %}
          
          {% if block.settings.slide_controls == false %}
            {% assign hide = "split-hide" %}  
          {% endif %}
          
          {% if block.settings.slide_loop %}
            {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}  
          {% endif %}

          {% if block.settings.slide_autoplay %}
            {% assign autoplay = "&muted=1&autoplay=1" %}  
          {% endif %}

          {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_controls == false %}
            {% assign secondary_hide = "split-hide" %}  
          {% endif %}
          
          {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_loop %}
            {% assign secondary_loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: secondary_video_id %}  
          {% endif %}

          {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_autoplay %}
            {% assign secondary_autoplay = "&muted=1&autoplay=1" %}  
          {% endif %}
          
          <div class="swiper-slide split-slide-{{ block.id }}">

            <div class="split-slide-media-{{ block.id }} split-slide-media-mobile">
              
              {% if block.settings.slide_media == "image" %}
                {% if block.settings.slide_image == blank %}
                  <div class="split-slide-first-{{ block.id }}">
                    {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                  </div>
                {% else %}
                  <div class="split-slide-first-{{ block.id }}">
                    <img src="{{ block.settings.slide_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="split-slide-first-{{ forloop.index }}">
                  </div>
                {% endif %}
              {% else %}
                <div class="split-slide-video-element split-slide-video-{{ block.id }} split-slide-video-first-{{ block.id }} split-slide-first-{{ block.id }}">
  
                  {% if block.settings.slide_poster != blank %}
                    <div class="split-slide-overlay-element split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }}">
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.slide_poster | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="">
                    </div>
                  {% elsif block.settings.slide_poster == blank and  block.settings.slide_autoplay == false %}
                    <div class="split-slide-overlay-element split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }}">
                       {{ 'lifestyle-1' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
  
                  {% if block.settings.slide_controls and block.settings.slide_autoplay == false %}
                    <div class="split-slide-video-btn-element split-slide-video-btn-{{ block.id }}">
                      <div id="split-slide-btn-second" class="split-slide-btn-{{ block.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.slide_icon != blank %}
                          <img src="{{ block.settings.slide_icon | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="">
                        {% else %}
                          <svg fill="#000000" version="1.1" id="Capa_1" width="800px" height="800px" viewBox="0 0 408.221 408.221" xml:space="preserve">
                            <g><g><path d="M204.11,0C91.388,0,0,91.388,0,204.111c0,112.725,91.388,204.11,204.11,204.11c112.729,0,204.11-91.385,204.11-204.11
                                      C408.221,91.388,316.839,0,204.11,0z M286.547,229.971l-126.368,72.471c-17.003,9.75-30.781,1.763-30.781-17.834V140.012
                                      c0-19.602,13.777-27.575,30.781-17.827l126.368,72.466C303.551,204.403,303.551,220.217,286.547,229.971z"/>
                            </g></g>
                          </svg>
                        {% endif %}
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                
                  {%- if block.settings.slide_video == null and block.settings.slide_video_url != null -%}
                    {%- if block.settings.slide_video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                      <iframe
                        data-src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{% if block.settings.slide_autoplay %}&muted=1&autoplay=1{% endif %}{{ loop }}"
                        class="lazy"
                        allow="autoplay; encrypted-media"
                        allowfullscreen
                        title="Split Slide Video"
                      ></iframe>
                    {%- else -%}
                      <iframe
                        data-src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}{% if block.settings.slide_autoplay %}&muted=1&autoplay=1{% endif %}{{ loop }}"
                        class="lazy"
                        allow="autoplay; encrypted-media"
                        allowfullscreen
                        title="Split Slide Video"
                      ></iframe>
                    {% endif %}
                  
                  {% else %}

                    <video data-src="{{ block.settings.slide_video.sources[1].url }}" {% if block.settings.slide_controls %}controls{% endif %} {% if block.settings.slide_loop %}loop{% endif %} {% if block.settings.slide_autoplay %}autoplay muted{% endif %}  playsinline preload="none" class="lazy"></video>
                  
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
              {% endif %}

              {% if block.settings.slide_columns == "3" %}
                {% if block.settings.slide_columns_mobile == "second" %}
                  {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_media == "image" %}
                    {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_image == blank %}
                      <div class="split-slide-third-{{ block.id }}">
                        {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                      </div>
                    {% else %}
                      <div class="split-slide-third-{{ block.id }}">
                        <img src="{{ block.settings.secondary_slide_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="split-slide-third-{{ forloop.index }}">
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                  {% else %}
                    <div class="split-slide-video-element split-slide-video-{{ block.id }} split-slide-video-third-{{ block.id }} split-slide-third-{{ block.id }}">
      
                      {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_poster != blank %}
                        <div class="split-slide-overlay-element split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }}">
                          <img src="{{ block.settings.secondary_slide_poster | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="">
                        </div>
                      {% elsif block.settings.secondary_slide_poster == blank and  block.settings.secondary_slide_autoplay == false %}
                        <div class="split-slide-overlay-element split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }}">
                          {{ 'lifestyle-1' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
      
                      {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_controls and block.settings.secondary_slide_autoplay == false %}
                        <div class="split-slide-video-btn-element split-slide-video-btn-{{ block.id }}">
                          <div id="split-slide-btn-second" class="split-slide-btn-{{ block.id }}">
                            {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_icon != blank %}
                              <img src="{{ block.settings.secondary_slide_icon | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="">
                            {% else %}
                              <svg fill="#000000" version="1.1" id="Capa_1" width="800px" height="800px" viewBox="0 0 408.221 408.221" xml:space="preserve">
                                <g><g><path d="M204.11,0C91.388,0,0,91.388,0,204.111c0,112.725,91.388,204.11,204.11,204.11c112.729,0,204.11-91.385,204.11-204.11
                                          C408.221,91.388,316.839,0,204.11,0z M286.547,229.971l-126.368,72.471c-17.003,9.75-30.781,1.763-30.781-17.834V140.012
                                          c0-19.602,13.777-27.575,30.781-17.827l126.368,72.466C303.551,204.403,303.551,220.217,286.547,229.971z"/>
                                </g></g>
                              </svg>
                            {% endif %}
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
                    
                      {%- if block.settings.secondary_slide_video == null and block.settings.secondary_slide_video_url != null -%}
                        {%- if block.settings.secondary_slide_video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                          <iframe
                            data-src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ secondary_video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{% if block.settings.secondary_slide_autoplay %}&muted=1&autoplay=1{% endif %}{{ secondary_loop }}"
                            class="lazy"
                            allow="autoplay; encrypted-media"
                            allowfullscreen
                            title="Split Slide Video"
                          ></iframe>
                        {%- else -%}
                          <iframe
                            data-src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ secondary_video_id }}{% if block.settings.secondary_slide_autoplay %}&muted=1&autoplay=1{% endif %}{{ secondary_loop }}"
                            class="lazy"
                            allow="autoplay; encrypted-media"
                            allowfullscreen
                            title="Split Slide Video"
                          ></iframe>
                        {% endif %}
                      
                      {% else %}

                        <video data-src="{{ block.settings.secondary_slide_video.sources[1].url }}" {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_controls %}controls{% endif %} {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_loop %}loop{% endif %} {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_autoplay %}autoplay muted{% endif %}  playsinline preload="none" class="lazy"></video>
                      
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                {% endif %}
              {% endif %}
              
            </div>
            
            {% if block.settings.slide_media == "image" %}
              {% if block.settings.slide_image == blank %}
                <div class="split-slide-image-{{ block.id }} split-slide-first-{{ block.id }}">
                  {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }} 
                </div>
              {% else %}
                <div class="split-slide-image-{{ block.id }} split-slide-first-{{ block.id }}">
                  <img src="{{ block.settings.slide_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="split-slide-first-{{ forloop.index }}">
                </div>
              {% endif %}
            {% else %}
              <div {% if block.settings.slide_media == "video" %}data-video="video"{% endif %} class="split-slide-media-desktop split-slide-video-element split-slide-video-{{ block.id }} split-slide-video-first-{{ block.id }} split-slide-first-{{ block.id }} split-hide">

                {% if block.settings.slide_poster != blank %}
                  <div class="split-slide-overlay-element split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }}">
                    <img src="{{ block.settings.slide_poster | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="">
                  </div>
                {% elsif block.settings.slide_poster == blank and  block.settings.slide_autoplay == false %}
                  <div class="split-slide-overlay-element split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }}">
                    {{ 'lifestyle-1' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                  </div>
                {% endif %}

                {% if block.settings.slide_controls and block.settings.slide_autoplay == false %}
                  <div class="split-slide-video-btn-element split-slide-video-btn-{{ block.id }}">
                    <div id="split-slide-btn-second" class="split-slide-btn-{{ block.id }}">
                      {% if block.settings.slide_icon != blank %}
                        <img src="{{ block.settings.slide_icon | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="">
                      {% else %}
                        <svg fill="#000000" version="1.1" id="Capa_1" width="800px" height="800px" viewBox="0 0 408.221 408.221" xml:space="preserve">
                          <g><g><path d="M204.11,0C91.388,0,0,91.388,0,204.111c0,112.725,91.388,204.11,204.11,204.11c112.729,0,204.11-91.385,204.11-204.11
                                    C408.221,91.388,316.839,0,204.11,0z M286.547,229.971l-126.368,72.471c-17.003,9.75-30.781,1.763-30.781-17.834V140.012
                                    c0-19.602,13.777-27.575,30.781-17.827l126.368,72.466C303.551,204.403,303.551,220.217,286.547,229.971z"/>
                          </g></g>
                        </svg>
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                {% endif %}
              
                {%- if block.settings.slide_video == null and block.settings.slide_video_url != null -%}
                  {%- if block.settings.slide_video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                    <iframe
                      data-src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{% if block.settings.slide_autoplay %}&mute=1&autoplay=1{% endif %}{{ loop }}"
                      class="lazy"
                      allow="autoplay; encrypted-media"
                      allowfullscreen
                      title="Split Slide Video"
                    ></iframe>
                  {%- else -%}
                    <iframe
                      data-src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}{% if block.settings.slide_autoplay %}&mute=1&autoplay=1{% endif %}{{ loop }}"
                      class="lazy"
                      allow="autoplay; encrypted-media"
                      allowfullscreen
                      title="Split Slide Video"
                    ></iframe>
                  {% endif %}
                
                {% else %}

                  <video data-src="{{ block.settings.slide_video.sources[1].url }}" {% if block.settings.slide_controls %}controls{% endif %} {% if block.settings.slide_loop %}loop{% endif %} {% if block.settings.slide_autoplay %}autoplay muted{% endif %}  playsinline preload="none" class="lazy"></video>
                
                {% endif %}
              </div>
            {% endif %}

            <div class="split-slide-text-{{ block.id }} split-slide-second-{{ block.id }}">
              {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
                <h2>{{ block.settings.heading }}</h2>
              {% endif %}

              {% if block.settings.sub_heading != blank %}
                <h3>{{ block.settings.sub_heading }}</h3>
              {% endif %}

              {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                <p>{{ block.settings.text }}</p>
              {% endif %}

              {% if block.settings.link != blank %}
                <a href="{{ block.settings.link_url }}">{{ block.settings.link }}</a>
              {% endif %}
            </div>
              
            {% if block.settings.slide_columns == "3" %}
              {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_media == "image" %}
                {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_image == blank %}
                  <div class="split-slide-image-{{ block.id }} split-slide-third-{{ block.id }}">
                    {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }} 
                  </div>
                {% else %}
                  <div class="split-slide-image-{{ block.id }} split-slide-third-{{ block.id }}">
                    <img src="{{ block.settings.secondary_slide_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="split-slide-third-{{ forloop.index }}">
                  </div>
                {% endif %}
              {% else %}
                <div class="split-slide-media-desktop split-slide-video-element split-slide-video-{{ block.id }} split-slide-video-third-{{ block.id }} split-slide-third-{{ block.id }} split-hide">
  
                  {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_poster != blank %}
                    <div class="split-slide-overlay-element split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }}">
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.secondary_slide_poster | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="">
                    </div>
                  {% elsif block.settings.secondary_slide_poster == blank and block.settings.secondary_slide_autoplay == false %}
                    <div class="split-slide-overlay-element split-slide-overlay-{{ block.id }}">
                      {{ 'lifestyle-1' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
  
                  {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_controls and block.settings.secondary_slide_autoplay == false %}
                    <div class="split-slide-video-btn-element split-slide-video-btn-{{ block.id }}">
                      <div id="split-slide-btn-second" class="split-slide-btn-{{ block.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_icon != blank %}
                          <img src="{{ block.settings.secondary_slide_icon | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="">
                        {% else %}
                          <svg fill="#000000" version="1.1" id="Capa_1" width="800px" height="800px" viewBox="0 0 408.221 408.221" xml:space="preserve">
                            <g><g><path d="M204.11,0C91.388,0,0,91.388,0,204.111c0,112.725,91.388,204.11,204.11,204.11c112.729,0,204.11-91.385,204.11-204.11
                                      C408.221,91.388,316.839,0,204.11,0z M286.547,229.971l-126.368,72.471c-17.003,9.75-30.781,1.763-30.781-17.834V140.012
                                      c0-19.602,13.777-27.575,30.781-17.827l126.368,72.466C303.551,204.403,303.551,220.217,286.547,229.971z"/>
                            </g></g>
                          </svg>
                        {% endif %}
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                
                  {%- if block.settings.secondary_slide_video == null and block.settings.secondary_slide_video_url != null -%}
                    {%- if block.settings.secondary_slide_video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                      <iframe
                        data-src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ secondary_video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{% if block.settings.secondary_slide_autoplay %}&mute=1&autoplay=1{% endif %}{{ secondary_loop }}"
                        class="lazy"
                        allow="autoplay; encrypted-media"
                        allowfullscreen
                        title="Split Slide Video"
                      ></iframe>
                    {%- else -%}
                      <iframe
                        data-src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ secondary_video_id }}{% if block.settings.secondary_slide_autoplay %}&mute=1&autoplay=1{% endif %}{{ secondary_loop }}"
                        class="lazy"
                        allow="autoplay; encrypted-media"
                        allowfullscreen
                        title="Split Slide Video"
                      ></iframe>
                    {% endif %}
                  
                  {% else %}
  
                    <video data-src="{{ block.settings.secondary_slide_video.sources[1].url }}" {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_controls %}controls{% endif %} {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_loop %}loop{% endif %} {% if block.settings.secondary_slide_autoplay %}autoplay muted{% endif %}  playsinline preload="none" class="lazy"></video>
                  
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
              {% endif %}
            {% endif %}
          
          </div>
        {% endfor %}
        
      </div>
      {% if section.settings.slide_navigation == "bullets" %}
        {% if section.blocks.size > 1 %}
          <div class="split-slide-pagination-{{ section.id }} swiper-pagination"></div>
        {% endif %}
      {% else %}
        <div class="split-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 512 512"><path d="M233.4 406.6c12.5 12.5 32.8 12.5 45.3 0l192-192c12.5-12.5 12.5-32.8 0-45.3s-32.8-12.5-45.3 0L256 338.7 86.6 169.4c-12.5-12.5-32.8-12.5-45.3 0s-12.5 32.8 0 45.3l192 192z"/></svg>
        </div>
        <div class="split-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 512 512"><path d="M233.4 406.6c12.5 12.5 32.8 12.5 45.3 0l192-192c12.5-12.5 12.5-32.8 0-45.3s-32.8-12.5-45.3 0L256 338.7 86.6 169.4c-12.5-12.5-32.8-12.5-45.3 0s-12.5 32.8 0 45.3l192 192z"/></svg>
        </div>
      {% endif %}
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-lazyload@19.1.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script>
            
<script>
  function handleSlideChange() {
    var activeSlideIndex = this.activeIndex;
    var activeSlide = this.slides[activeSlideIndex];
  
    var inactiveSlides = document.querySelectorAll('.swiper-slide:not(.swiper-slide-active)');
    if (inactiveSlides) {
      inactiveSlides.forEach(element => {
        let vidElements = element.querySelectorAll('video');
        if (vidElements) {
          vidElements.forEach(e => {
            e.pause();
          })
        }
        let frames = element.querySelectorAll('iframe');
        if (frames) {
          frames.forEach(e => {
            e.contentWindow.postMessage('{"event":"command","func":"' + 'stopVideo' + '","args":""}', '*');
          })
        }
      })
    }
  
    let vids = activeSlide.querySelectorAll('.split-slide-video-element');
    if (vids.length > 0) {
      vids.forEach(vid => {
        let frames = vid.querySelectorAll('iframe');
        if (frames) {
          frames.forEach(frame => {
            url = frame.src;
            if (url.includes('autoplay')) {
              frame.contentWindow.postMessage('{"event":"command","func":"' + 'playVideo' + '","args":""}', '*');
            }
          })
        }
        let vidElements = vid.querySelectorAll('video');
        if (vidElements) {
          vidElements.forEach(vidElement => {
            auto = vidElement.getAttribute('autoplay');
            if (auto == "autoplay") {
              vidElement.play();
            }
          })
        }
      })
    }
  }
  function initSplitUniq() {

    let lazyLoadInstance = new LazyLoad();

    window.addEventListener(
      "LazyLoad::Initialized",
      function (event) {
        window.lazyLoadInstance = event.detail.instance;
      },
      false
    );
    
    const slider = new Swiper(".split-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 800,
      spaceBetween: 20,
      {% if section.blocks.size > 1 %}
        loop: true,
      {% endif %}
      {% if section.blocks.size < 2 %}
        simulateTouch: false,
      {% endif %}
      watchOverflow: false,
      {% if section.settings.slider_autoplay %}
      autoplay: {
        delay: {{ section.settings.slider_autoplay_seconds }}000,
      },
      {% endif %}
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.split-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.split-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      pagination: {
        el: '.split-slide-pagination-{{ section.id }}',
        type: 'bullets',
        clickable: true,
      }
    });

    if(slider) {
      slider.addEventListener('slideChange', handleSlideChange); 
    }
    
    const videos = document.querySelectorAll('.split-slide-video-element');
    if(videos) {
      videos.forEach(video => {
          let btn = video.querySelector('.split-slide-video-btn-element'); 
          let frame = video.querySelector('iframe');  
          let videoElement = video.querySelector('video');
          let wrapper = video.querySelector('.split-slide-overlay-element');
          
          if(btn) {
            btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
              if(frame) {
                frame.src += "&autoplay=1";
              }
              if(videoElement) {
                videoElement.play();
              }
              btn.classList.add('hide');
              wrapper.classList.add('hide');
            });
          }

          if(wrapper) {
            wrapper.addEventListener('click', () => {
              if(frame) {
                frame.src += "&autoplay=1";
              }
              if(videoElement) {
                videoElement.play();
              }
              wrapper.classList.add('hide');
              btn.classList.add('hide');
            }) 
          }
      });
    };
  }
  
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initSplitUniq);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initSplitUniq);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initSplitUniq);
  }
</script>
